lostcitiesautoloader.config.title: Lost Cities Autoloader Configuration
lostcitiesautoloader.config.enableAutolo: Enable the Lost Cities autoloader functionality
lostcitiesautoloader.config.configFileNa: Name of the configuration file to load from config/lost_cities_autoloader/ directory (without .json extension)
lostcitiesautoloader.config.lostCityDime: Dimension where Lost Cities should generate
lostcitiesautoloader.config.enableCustom: Enable custom player spawn dimension (separate from Lost Cities dimension)
lostcitiesautoloader.config.playerSpawnD: Dimension where players should spawn when joining the world
lostcitiesautoloader.message.no_config: No autoloader configuration found - using default settings
lostcitiesautoloader.message.lostcities_: Lost Cities mod not found - autoloader will not function
lostcitiesautoloader.error.profile_apply: Failed to apply profile to Lost Cities
lostcitiesautoloader.error.invalid_profi: Profile '%s' not found in Lost Cities
